cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to a negative value like -1 will cause configuration validation errors as gNB IDs must be non-negative.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to 100 dBm, which exceeds the maximum allowed transmit power, will cause hardware or configuration errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為 100 dBm，這超出允許的最大發射功率，會導致硬體或配置錯誤。
